an4.67:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an4.67:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññataro bhikkhu ahinā daṭṭho kālaṅkato hoti.
an4.67:4.3: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an4.67:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an4.67:4.6: “idha, bhante, sāvatthiyaṃ aññataro bhikkhu ahinā daṭṭho kālaṅkato”ti.
an4.67:5.1: “Na hi nūna so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattāri ahirājakulāni mettena cittena phari.
an4.67:5.2: Sace hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattāri ahirājakulāni mettena cittena phareyya, na hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ahinā daṭṭho kālaṃ kareyya.
an4.67:6.2: Virūpakkhaṃ ahirājakulaṃ, erāpathaṃ ahirājakulaṃ, chabyāputtaṃ ahirājakulaṃ, kaṇhāgotamakaṃ ahirājakulaṃ.
an4.67:6.3: Na hi nūna so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imāni cattāri ahirājakulāni mettena cittena phari.
an4.67:6.4: Sace hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imāni cattāri ahirājakulāni mettena cittena phareyya, na hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ahinā daṭṭho kālaṃ kareyya.
an4.67:7.1: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imāni cattāri ahirājakulāni mettena cittena pharituṃ attaguttiyā attarakkhāya attaparittāyāti.
an4.67:8.1: * Virūpakkhehi me mettaṃ,
an4.67:9.2: mettaṃ dvipādakehi me;
an4.67:10.2: mā maṃ hiṃsi dvipādako;
an4.67:11.4: mā kañci pāpamāgamā.
an4.67:12.4: Pamāṇavantāni sarīsapāni.
an4.67:13.3: Katā me rakkhā katā me parittā,
